text: As reported on StackOverflow in http://stackoverflow.com/questions/20623950/open-an-xls-file-with-hssfworkbook-crash-my-app-in-run-time : PropertySetFactory has an import to java.rmi.UnexpectedException, which is used to throw on a broken setup. This is an odd exception to use, as we don't use RMI, and it can cause issues on Android. It should be swapped for something more standard.
creator: apache@gagravarr.org
apache@gagravarr.org
text: Fixed in r1551832, now uses java.lang.IllegalStateException instead.
*** Bug 55900 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: apache@gagravarr.org
